!1 Collect Term
Collection terms are used to tell the system from the relationship between a metadata group and its children that the data that the child has should be picked out for further processing. 
There are three types of collection terms. 

!2 Collect Permission Term
Permission terms are used to pick out data to use it to control which users are allowed to do what with the current record.
!2 Collect Index Term
Indexing terms are used to index the designated data for use in searches.
!2 Collect Storage Term
Storage terms are used to filter data when listing data.
